alert.note: Alert for Alexander; Pulaski (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 3:53PM CDT until July 02 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Pulaski County in southern Illinois... Central Alexander County in southern Illinois... Northern Mississippi County in southeastern Missouri... Central Scott County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 353 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Benton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cairo, Benton, Mounds, Morley, Tamms, Mound City, Kelso, Olive Branch, Hay-Wood City, Horseshoe Lake Conservation Area, Olmsted, Blodgett, Pulaski, Diehlstadt, Commerce and Lambert. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 1 and 17. Interstate 57 in Missouri between Mile Markers 14 and 21. Interstate 55 between Mile Markers 72 and 88. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
